name: Death Platter
entries: Ingredients: x2 Rare Undead Meat, x1 Deathrose
Effect: When you eat this meal you must make a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or die instantly. If you succeed on the save, your life signs become undetectable for the duration of the meal.

description.chatFlavor: DC 10 Con save or die. Success: life signs undetectable.
